argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tfri1d.1 | |- F = recs ( G ) |
| 2 |  | tfri1d.2 | |- ( ph -> A. x ( Fun G /\ ( G ` x ) e. _V ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_tfri1d | |- ( ph -> F Fn On ) |
| 4 |  | #P_fndm | |- ( F Fn On -> dom F = On ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> dom F = On ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( ph -> ( A e. dom F <-> A e. On ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_biimpar | |- ( ( ph /\ A e. On ) -> A e. dom F ) |
| 8 | 1 | #P_tfr2a | |- ( A e. dom F -> ( F ` A ) = ( G ` ( F |` A ) ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( ( ph /\ A e. On ) -> ( F ` A ) = ( G ` ( F |` A ) ) ) |
